name: GLBT Historical Society Museum
description: Free First Sundays and $7 reduced admission for seniors/students/military
fullDescription: The GLBT Historical Society Museum in the Castro preserves and exhibits LGBTQ+ history, culture, and arts, with free admission days and reduced rates available.
whatTheyOffer:
- Free First Sundays (free admission monthly)
- Regular admission only $10
- Seniors, students, military: $7
- LGBTQ+ history exhibitions
- Research archives access
- Educational programs
- Community events
howToGetIt:
1. Visit on First Sunday for free admission
2. Or pay regular admission ($10, $7 reduced)
3. Check website for current exhibitions
4. Access archives by appointment
5. Join educational programs
keywords: GLBT Historical Society, Castro, San Francisco, LGBTQ museum, gay history, lesbian history, free admission, First Sunday, senior discount, student discount
